0011010001110010 0000001100100101 1 -> sum: 0011011110011000, cout: 0
0001010010101001 0110101001110000 0 -> sum: 0111111100011001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
